<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stay Down!](/Feats.aspx?ID=1806) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 137 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Trigger**
A [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) foe within your reach [Stands](/Actions.aspx?ID=86).

</column>

---

You have ways of keeping your foes down. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the triggering foe's Fortitude DC. On a success, they don't stand up and remain prone. On a critical success, they can't Stand until their next turn.
name: Stay Down!
